summary: Quattro nuovi poster promozionali per Captain Marvel
title: Quattro nuovi poster promozionali per Captain Marvel
body:
Quattro nuovi poster promozionali per Captain Marvel

I Marvel Studios hanno rilasciato in questi giorni – via Trends International – dedicati a Captain Marvel, il prossimo cinecomic con Brie Larson protagonista.

Nei nuovi poster spazio anche per il gatto di Carol Danvers, e Talos, lo Skrull nel film interpretato da Ben Mendelsohn.

Captain Marvel è diretto da Anna Boden e Ryan Fleck. La sceneggiatura è di Ginevra Robertson-Dworet e Nicole…

summary: Egy új Marvel Kapitány képpel gazdagodtunk, miközben felfedték a játékidőt is
title: Egy új Marvel Kapitány képpel gazdagodtunk, miközben felfedték a játékidőt is
body:
Ilyen hosszú lesz a Marvel Kapitány, amiből most kaptunk egy hivatalos képet is. #Marvel #MarvelKapitány #CarolDanvers #BrieLarson

Egy új képet kaptunk a Marvel Kapitány főhőséről, miközben az egyik amerikai mozioldal leleplezte, hogy milyen hosszú lesz a Marvel Moziverzum első női szuperhősfilmje.

A Marvel az idei év első szuperhősfilm bemutatójára készül, ugyanis március 7-én országszerte bemutatják a Marvel Moziverzum huszonegyedik részét, a Brie Larson színésznő főszerepében érkező első női önálló szuperhősfilmet, a Mar…

summary: Listen, Mr. Feige. I love what you’ve done, but where’s the lesbianism? Sure thruce is cute, and stucky is the best, and Peggy...
body:
Listen, Mr. Feige. I love what you’ve done, but where’s the lesbianism? Sure thruce is cute, and stucky is the best, and Peggy and Angie, I’ll get behind, nebula and mantis sure, Wanda and Nat are noice. But the creme de la creme is a ship us folks would call caroljess, the best lesbians ever, a comic book version of foxxay, they’re in love, but don’t know it.

I think in FFH, if not in the movie, in the end credits, like I’m expecting them to do with Kamala in CM, maybe showcase her as a shield agent, that looks over Peter, requested by fury. Idk.

Another topic, Brie Larson. I love her so much, it’s impossible to explain. Do you know how many times I’ve thought about Envy Adams ina my other way, than what you’re thinking? None. Her singing is amazing, she’s quite funny, and her accommodations for her amazing acting were given accordingly. But, everyone slams Carol. For several reasons

1. Her height, although I haven’t seen comments on this, I know sexist twinks say stuff about it, she’s 2 in shorter than carol

2. Her voice, yes I do feel, because of representation of carol having a very deep voice, similar to mine, whoever plays her should have a little bass in their voice, but trying to make her change everything for a role? That’s like asking Evangeline to not be sexy, ever again, not only makes people upset, but it’s ridiculous

3. Her body. First of all she’s hot, and she can sing, and she has an Oscar, one of the largest acting awards academies ever. That’s more than any of you can say. I’ve seen everything, well mainly the upper body region, but you know.

Watch everyone that hated her, cheer her on, when she’s fights, and the movie is light hearted, and oh! Guess what? She SMILES *acts shocked*, because you credit Evans for being serious, and that makes him the best, but when Brie looks serious, IN A TRAILER, y’all flip


EDIT: I wish they’d teased Kamala, but hey the movie was still good

Listen, Mr. Feige. I love what you’ve done, but where’s the lesbianism? Sure thruce is cute, and stucky is the best, and Peggy and Angie, I’ll get behind, nebula and mantis sure, Wanda and Nat are noice. But the creme de la creme is a ship us folks would call caroljess, the best lesbians ever, a comic book version of foxxay, they’re in love, but don’t know it.

I think in FFH, if not in the movie, in the end credits, like I’m expecting them to do with Kamala in CM, maybe showcase her as a shield agent, that looks over Peter, requested by fury. Idk.

Another topic, Brie Larson. I love her so much, it’s impossible to explain. Do you know how many times I’ve thought about Envy Adams ina my other way, than what you’re thinking? None. Her singing is amazing, she’s quite funny, and her accommodations for her amazing acting were given accordingly. But, everyone slams Carol. For several reasons

1. Her height, although I haven’t seen comments on this, I know sexist twinks say stuff about it, she’s 2 in shorter than carol

2. Her voice, yes I do feel, because of representation of carol having a very deep voice, similar to mine, whoever plays her should have a little bass in their voice, but trying to make her change everything for a role? That’s like asking Evangeline to not be sexy, ever again, not only makes people upset, but it’s ridiculous

3. Her body. First of all she’s hot, and she can sing, and she has an Oscar, one of the largest acting awards academies ever. That’s more than any of you can say. I’ve seen everything, well mainly the upper body region, but you know.

Watch everyone that hated her, cheer her on, when she’s fights, and the movie is light hearted, and oh! Guess what? She SMILES *acts shocked*, because you credit Evans for being serious, and that makes him the best, but when Brie looks serious, IN A TRAILER, y’all flip


EDIT: I wish they’d teased Kamala, but hey the movie was still good

summary: brielarson: “Life was not to be sitting in hot amorphic leisure in my backyard idly writing or not writing, as the spirit moved...
caption: brielarson: “Life was not to be sitting in hot amorphic leisure in my backyard idly writing or not writing, as the spirit moved me. It was, instead, running madly, in a crowded schedule, in a squirrel cage of busy people. Working, living, dancing, dreaming, talking, kissing- singing, laughing, learning.” #SylviaPlath (x)

reblog.comment: brielarson: “Life was not to be sitting in hot amorphic leisure in my backyard idly writing or not writing, as the spirit moved me. summary: Captain Marvel: nuovo sguardo a Carol Danvers con il celebre elmo
title: Captain Marvel: nuovo sguardo a Carol Danvers con il celebre elmo
body:
Captain Marvel: nuovo sguardo a Carol Danvers con il celebre elmo

Brie Larson come Carol Danvers / Capitan Marvel sembra essere semplicemente perfetta, e non solo perché è un’attrice sensazionale, ma perché da un punto di vista estetico / visivo è una perfetta controparte live-action del personaggio, e i due registi, Ryan Fleck e Anna Boden, sembra che abbiano voluto accontentare proprio tutti i fan del personaggio, facendo indossare a quest’ultimo anche il…
